casebody.data:
Silas T. MCADOO, Petitioner-Appellant,
and
Barbara McAdoo, Petitioner,
v.
CITY OF LUDINGTON, Respondent-Appellee. SC: 156706
COA: 33886 Supreme Court of Michigan. September 12, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the motion for reconsideration of this Court's May 1, 2018 order is considered, and it is DENIED, because it does not appear that the order was entered erroneously. The motions for miscellaneous relief are DENIED.
